room_title: Escape room "The Inventor's Workshop" by Mountain Room Escapes in Big Bear City
room_address: 1121 W Big Bear Blvd, Big Bear City, CA 92314
room_description: Take a journey to Moonbeam Hollow, where an evil wizard has cast a powerful spell freezing the small town  in time. But the inventor may have a solution! Go to his workshop and finish constructing his machine and restore Moonbeam Hollow to it’s place in time! But work quickly! The wizard is on to your daring plan and he won’t sit idly by…
